typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		national_provider_identifier as string,
		last_name_organization_name_of_the_provider as string,
		first_name_of_the_provider as string,
		middle_initial_of_the_provider as string,
		credentials_of_the_provider as string,
		gender_of_the_provider as string,
		entity_type_of_the_provider as string,
		street_address_1_of_the_provider as string,
		street_address_2_of_the_provider as string,
		city_of_the_provider as string,
		zip_code_of_the_provider as string,
		state_code_of_the_provider as string,
		country_code_of_the_provider as string,
		provider_type as string,
		medicare_participation_indicator as string,
		place_of_service as string,
		hcpcs_code as string,
		hcpcs_description as string,
		hcpcs_drug_indicator as string,
		number_of_services as string,
		number_of_medicare_beneficiaries as string,
		number_of_distinct_medicare_beneficiary_per_day_services as string,
		average_medicare_allowed_amount as string,
		average_submitted_charge_amount as string,
		average_medicare_payment_amount as string,
		average_medicare_standardized_amount as string,
		year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> PhycisianCompare
source(output(
		national_provider_identifier as string,
		year as string,
		licensure_status as string,
		licensure_activity_status as string,
		expiration_date as string,
		status_effective_date as string,
		last_name as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		practice_location_address_state as string,
		credential as string,
		medical_school_name as string,
		graduation_year as string,
		primary_specialty as string,
		all_secondary_specialties as string,
		organization_legal_name as string,
		number_of_group_practice_members as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_1 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_1 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_2 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_2 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_3 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_3 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_4 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_4 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_ccn_5 as string,
		hospital_affiliation_lbn_5 as string,
		professional_accepts_medicare_assignment as string,
		gender_of_the_provider as string,
		entity_type_of_the_provider as string,
		provider_type as string,
		hcpcs_code as string,
		hcpcs_description as string,
		hcpcs_drug_indicator as string,
		number_of_services as string,
		number_of_medicare_beneficiaries as string,
		number_of_distinct_medicare_beneficiary_per_day_services as string,
		average_medicare_allowed_amount as string,
		average_submitted_charge_amount as string,
		average_medicare_payment_amount as string,
		average_medicare_standardized_amount as string,
		apm_affiliation_1 as string,
		apm_affiliation_2 as string,
		apm_affiliation_3 as string,
		apm_affiliation_4 as string,
		attestation_value as string,
		measure_performance_rate as string,
		denominator_count as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
PhycisianCompare derive(each(match(type=='string'), $$ + '_clean' = regexReplace($$, '(\\w)', ''))) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 aggregate(agg_count = countDistinct(national_provider_identifier)) ~> Aggregate1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'espy360blob1',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
